feed.title: Tatsuya Murakami
feed.subtitle: My research aims to understand the pathogenic mechanisms underlying neurological disorders. We integrate 3D single-cell-resolution imaging with deep learning, focusing on developing a suite of tools to standardize the human brain anatomy at the cellular level.
